Sentencas: SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) single cells with anode active layers of various thicknesses were fabricated successfully via tape casting and co-firing in order to improve their electrochemical performance and long-term stability.
Titulo: Characteristics of SOFC single cells with anode active layer via tape casting and co-firing

Sentencas: The mercury porosimeter and the gas permeability were measured so as to examine the effects of the anode active layer while under a gaseous flow.
Titulo: Characteristics of SOFC single cells with anode active layer via tape casting and co-firing

Sentencas: It was found that the anode active layers affected the microstructural characteristics as a result of the pore distribution and the gas permeation behavior.
Titulo: Characteristics of SOFC single cells with anode active layer via tape casting and co-firing

Sentencas: The anode active layers improved the cell performance by increasing the number of active sites in the anode.
Titulo: Characteristics of SOFC single cells with anode active layer via tape casting and co-firing

Sentencas: The thickness of the anode active layer was optimized at 20 mu m in this work through a combination of the power density, the ohmic ASR (area specific resistance), and the cell ASR.
Titulo: Characteristics of SOFC single cells with anode active layer via tape casting and co-firing

Sentencas: SOFCs with the optimized active layer showed good electrochemical performance at 600-700 degrees C in hydrogen or hydrocarbon fuel (methane) and excellent long-term stability for 500 h. (9 2008 International Association for Hydrogen Energy.
Titulo: Characteristics of SOFC single cells with anode active layer via tape casting and co-firing
